title: (01008) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 25 Calle Pintor Teodoro Dublang
description: Free parking 10 minutes from the city center on foot by tree lined paths. advised directly by the tourist office. shot of the historical center in the nueva cathedral on the way

title: (01008) Gasteiz - 1 Miren Martinez Saez del Burgo Kalea
title_short: (01008) Gasteiz - 1 Miren Martinez Saez del Burgo Kalea
description: Quiet street on the outskirts of the new neighborhoods of Gasteiz.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 9 Portal de Foronda Kalea
description: Urban parking in the city. discreet and without noise, near a garden

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 8 Coronela Ibaibarriaga Kalea
description: Quiet place to spend the night next to the hospital. There are several bars around to have breakfast. at night there was no noise at all.

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
title_short: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
description: Great Parking Mendizorrotza Stadium, very quiet at night, near the center (10 min) walk and next bus. Avoid the days of events. Municipal pools next

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz -
description: Free and quiet day parking, near the old town of Vitoria Gasteiz, bars on the same street and the classroom (library).

title: (01007) Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
title_short: (01007) Gasteiz - 2 Amadeo Garcia de Salazar Plaza
description: Showers at the Municipal Sports Center. Large changing room and lots of showers, bathroom, hair dryer... Very clean.

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 4 Zumakadi Ibilbidea
description:
It is a paid parking area but in August it is free. we came here because the big motorhomes can't fit in the nearby area.
I guess you can sleep in this area but I'm not sure

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 19 Voluntaria Entrega Kalea
description: Laundry very close to the motorhome parking without having to cross the road.

title: (01010) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Portal de Foronda, 46
description: Services CLOSED on Wednesday mornings because of street market (see last photo). Very nice during the rest of the week. A bit noisy even at night due to nearby avenue.

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - A-3102
description: Mendizábala parking, very large with green areas around

title: (01010) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 50 Donostia San Sebastian Kalea
description: Self service laundry including detergent and softener in price. Cash only for dryer. Cash and credit card for washing machines. There is a change machine in the shop.

title: (01013) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 1 Zaramaga Plaza
description: Leroy Merlin parking suitable for 3m. Tall. Ideal to go to the Boulevard shopping center to buy or enjoy. You have to enter through the back area, where you put Leroy merchandise and continue back

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 3 Calle Julian de Arrese
description: Pàrquing next to the area, which was full

title: (01013) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 11 Oñati Kalea
description: Large parking lot quite flat, where there is plenty of space. We were two days and quite well, it fell on weekends, I do not know if the week can be noisy. It is 200 meters from a police station. Walking to the center takes about 15 minutes

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 1 Iruraiz-Gauna Kalea
description: Parking burger king et carrefour last empty places! Right next to a park with fountain, ping pong table, children's park, quiet area !!

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 12 Campo de los Palacios Kalea
title_short: (01006) Gasteiz - 12 Campo de los Palacios Kalea
description: Ample parking next to a Lidl 20'walk to the center

title: (01015) Gasteiz - 2 Juan Gris Kalea
description:
Municipal swimming pools, showers and public toilets.
In summer they usually close for rest a few days call before going

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 32 Ali Entitatea
description: West of Victoria, good for an overnight stopover. quiet, public lighting. Places along the road with very little traffic. 40 minutes walk from the old town center.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 43 Pamplona-Iruñea Kalea
description: self-service laundry

title: (01015) Gasteiz - 42-50 Sofia Erreginaren Hiribidea
description: Long road that runs through an area of public parks with a large supermarket nearby. In the area there are also great areas to walk and some bars less than a five minute walk away.

title: (01010) Gasteiz - 31 Landaberde Kalea
description:
Municipal swimming pools shower.
Call ahead just in case I don't know if it closes some days in summer.

title: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 34F Campo de los Palacios Kalea
title_short: (01006) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 34F Campo de los Palacios Kalea
description: A dozen places, right next to an entrance to Olarizu Park. Quiet, we stayed there for a few hours during the day.

title: (01013) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Humedales Ibilbidea
description: A quiet parking lot outside, there is no signage, there are a few vans and motorhomes. Next to the Aristi Gardens aparthotel. There is no service.

title: (01013) Gasteiz - 3F Ibaiondo Kalea
description:
Sports center with public toilets, shower and indoor pool. shower price 2'10.
in summer I don't know if they close a few days, check before you go

title: (01007) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Peregrino Ibilbidea
description: Superb location in a new street without any construction, at the foot of a large park and the start of several superb walks. (Compostela) very calm. Almost no traffic, no service.

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 22 Antonio Amat Maiz Kalea
description: quiet residential neighborhood

title: (01003) Gasteiz - 17 Nadine Gordimer Kalea
description: A secluded place to spend the night. Very quiet .. 10 minutes from downtown by bike. Nearby there are parks for children, grocery stores and bakery. There is also the Salburua park. A perfect place to spend the day watching animals with the children.

title: (01010) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 23 Urartea Kalea
description:
Ideal for cleaning motorhomes. It gives height and can be refueled.

LPG Cannister fill up okay as of February 2023.

title: (01006) Gasteiz - 45 Anboto Kalea
description: Parking at the foot of the Olarizu Park

title: (01191) Gasteiz - 23 Gobeo Entitatea
description: Parking at the entrance of Gobeo. Little frequented road at night. Entrance to the green belt of Vitoria-Gasteiz. Nice place to spend a night. Gas station in front and fountain in the town 2 minutes walk.

title: (01006) Araba - s/n Olarizu Hiribidea
description: Very quiet place throughout the year in the green ring of Vitoria-Gasteiz at the foot of the emblematic hill of Olarizu and next to the house of the dehesa (center for environmental studies) where in its exhibition space we will find the WC. Being in a park we find fountains and areas with tables, benches, swings, ... Just 300m from a supermarket and the popular neighborhood of Olarizu.

title: (01192) Gasteiz - Brusela Hiribidea
description: Parking at the roadside

title: (01195) Zuhatzu Gasteiz -
description: Shaded parking in the afternoon, access for PL and Bus (our measure 12m) very quiet place with two picnic tables in the shade lots of pedestrians but people are very respectful. Access to the city of Vitoria in 10min max. About 10 car parking spaces. 1 bin which is emptied regularly. Ideal place to rest and spend the night in peace

title: (01196) Yurre - 17 Entrada Yurre/Ihurre
description: Nice grassy space right on either side of the entrance to Yurre. It has a small stream and within the town there is a fountain. Less than 10 minutes from the city. Perfect to spend the day or even the night. We were alone, but we think 5/6 vehicles can easily fit. No police have passed. 100% recommendable.

title: (01191) Gasteiz - 17 Gobeo Entitatea
description: Parking avec toilettes public et jeux pour enfants

title: (01013) Gasteiz - 2 Zumar Hiribidea
description: Free parking next to a large park. Tree shadow. The natural park is open to the public free of charge in winter, paid in summer with an outdoor swimming pool. The parking lot is flat, very quiet to spend the night.

title: (01192) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 29 Elorriaga Entitatea
description: Large asphalt esplanade at the entrance to the park of Salburua, it is always very quiet the weeks of day and night where a source of drinking water was cut from December to March. Beside, there is a playground where there are usually families. There is a bus to the center 5 minutes walk.

title: (01013) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 30 Calle Portal de Zurbano
description: Parking next to the salburua park. Nice walk to do Quiet place to spend the night. bus to go to town This is the 2nd time we have slept there.

title: (01192) Arkaute - 12 Arcaute Entitatea
description: Wide and flat parking, gravel firm. At the entrance of the Salburúa park. Very quiet at night. Inside the park, near the entrance, there are tables to eat, benches and wastebaskets. starting point for the visit to the wetland, by bike or on foot.

title: (01194) Lasarte - 20 Lasarte Entitatea
description: Quiet parking to spend the night.

title: (01194) Mendiola - 7 La Salceda Kalea
description: Parking in town. You have a little field next door and the night's rest is assured.

name: Ibaia kanpina
title: (01195) Ibaia kanpina
description: Scruffy area and the place doesn't look any better either. I think people live here forever.- We actually wanted to go to the pitch, but since there was no sun, we needed electricity.

title: (01196) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 222 Autovía del Norte
description: Repsol LPG service station.

title: (01195) Krispiña - 4 Crispijana Entitatea
description: Parking in the green ring to walk around and enjoy the surroundings

title: (01196) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 209 Autovia Vitoria Altube Errepidea
description: At the rear the petrol station, clean asphalt area, with large lawn (super for children and dogs) and drinking water point (but no connection possible). Quite quiet even if not far from major roads. washing station, air, water, toilets in the resort. little trouble for a picnic or even a night (see if agreement of the station)

title: (01520) Zurbano - 2 Barrio la Landa
description: Parking at the foot of the church.

title: (01191) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Avenida los Huetos
description: No service but quiet in the middle of the fields! We only have to eat but we must be able to spend a peaceful night!

title: (01520) Zurbano - E-5
description: Fountain with water at the end of the parking lot next to the picnic tables. You can also upload grays to two places next to the source.

title: (01195) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Paduleta Kalea
description: Normal side parking spaces in the industrial area. Opposite is a hotel and restaurant, therefore lively and lit by street lamps. Cars drive by all the time, so not quiet, but safe.

title: (01192) Jungitu - 5 Jungitu Entitatea
description: Tap

title: (01192) Zerio - 6B Zerio Entitatea
description: Small friendly car park, with children's games, accessible. We just stopped for a break, there's drinking water

title: (01191) Mendoza - 38 Mendoza Entitatea
description: At the foot of the castle of Mendoza and close to the river to wash or cool off. Ideal for a picnic break.

title: (01195) - 2 Camino Término de Subillabide
description: Hot showers for petrol station customers :)

title: (01196) Etxabarri-Ibiña - 1B Kalea San Roke
description: After the pay barrier (coming from France), nice little car park in a village not far from a shopping center, quiet at night except for a few cargo planes taking off in the evening.

title: (01191) Mendoza - 32 Mendoza Entitatea
description: Going up towards the church, there is a playground for children. in front of the church you will find a tap!

title: (01520) Uribarri Arrazua - 2 Ullivarri Arrazua Entitatea
description: Drinking water. The village has a very beautiful hermitage and a bowling alley of "bolo alaves" traditional. You can not sleep in the village. There is a small parking on the road to the swamp.

title: (01195) Billoda - 2 San Cristobal Kalea
description: Very quiet picnic area, next to the Zadorra River. It has a fountain with drinking water and 3 tables. There are bins for recycling garbage.

title: (01195) Vitoria-Gasteiz - Subijana de Alava Entitatea
description:
Parking heavyweight and camper.
Hotel.
Great restaurant, cheap and very good.

title: (01192) Lubiano - 3 Lubiano Entitatea
description: A small water fountain under a tree right next to the bus shelter.

title: (01520) Arroiabe - 1 Mayor Plaza
description: Parking in the center of the town of Arroyabe. There is a source of drinking water and very close there is a playground and garbage containers.

title: (01193) Vitoria-Gasteiz - A-4159
description: Huge unlit parking lot of the Sanctuary of "Nuestra Señora de Estíbaliz". It is located away from the village in the middle of cornfields and is slightly sloping.

title: (01192) Vitoria-Gasteiz - A-3010
description: Quiet site for day and night. Ample parking and shade for vans. It has lots of tables, trash and swings. It has no bathroom. Near the Garaio reservoir where you can swim. 10 km from Vitoria Gasteiz. Very close to the car park is a village called Ullibarri Arrazua with a very nice traditional Bolo-Alaves bowling alley. It also has a fountain at the entrance to the village.

title: (01520) Álava - 8 Urrundia Kalea
description: Wide dead end road. Good for one night. Half turn possible. When we take the small path at the end of the road we arrive on a great point of view.

title: (01520) - Carretera de Betoño a Landa
description: Parking next to the lake dam.

title: (01230) Nanclares de la Oca - A-2622
description: Quiet parking, drainage, gray, black, with sports center with indoor and outdoor pools, spa, gym. Restaurant.

title: (01520) - Carretera de Betoño a Landa
description: Free parking, right just after the house kind and in front of a small wooden pontoon. View of the lake and the village. Very few cars (we were 2 trucks in the parking lot on 6/8/18). On the other hand there is passage on the road that passes but it is reasonable.

title: (01230) Nanclares de la Oca - 7 La Estación Kalea
title_short: (01230) Nanclares de la Oca - 7 La Estación Kalea
description: Gare de Nanclares, two minutes from the motorway? very calm, many places. Ideal to spend the night.

title: (01520) - 1 Nanclares Errepidea
description: Small parking lot that can accommodate up to 4 motorhomes, in principle it is reserved for people who go to the island, I spent one night there and without problem on Thursday. There was a car coming in and out of the pier but they hardly bothered.

title: (01230) - 2A El Castillo Igoera
description: Picnic area in the countryside. A nice clean area but the rest of the area is dirty. Nice view. Small background noise at night with far off but acceptable.

title: (01230) - Torre El Encinal
description: Quiet area next to La Torre El Encinal (from the Carlist era) with tables, a slightly rusty barbecue and a fountain. No services. To get there, when you get to the "road cut" sign you have to take the path to the left and the one to the right about 100 meters further.

title: (01230) Nanclares de la Oca - 3 Tras el Rio Kalea
title_short: (01230) Nanclares de la Oca - 3 Tras el Rio Kalea
description: Self-service laundry. 365: 09:00-21:00.

name: Bideko Araba
title: (01230) Bideko Araba
description: Cheap refueling, only diesel, and only during working hours.

title: (01520) Ullíbarri-Gamboa - 1 Barrio Arpidea
description: Very quiet parking to spend the night, no service, just enough to put the truck in a peaceful place, close to the road, but which does not disturb the tranquility in any way.  At the edge of the lake, not far from the cycle path and a small beach...

title: (09217) Imiruri - 7 Calle Manzano Verde
description: Parking at the doors of the town of Imiruri, nice and quiet, no signs forbidding to stay the night. Great spot for a walk/hike to the ghost town of Ochate and its tower.

title: (01170) Urrunaga - 1 Kurrua Kalea
description: If you go up the path to reach the top of the restaurant you will find a small concrete stadium and a climbing wall. It's a perfect little corner for a night of all sizes

title: (01138) Zaitegi -
description: Good, quiet spot to spend the night if you’re travelling through. You do see and hear the highway nearby, but that also means you can get going quickly again. The road up here is good, and I only saw some mountainbikers in the morning.

title: (01520) Legutio - Carretera de Betoño a Landa
title_short: (01520) Legutio - Carretera de Betoño a Landa
description: Nice place to have a lunch break near the lake. Shaded and quiet.

title: (01170) Legutio - 13 Calle Iñerigana
description: Place with a wonderful view of the lake. Wonderfully quiet on a small street. Unfortunately a bit of trash on the floor, but ideal for a night. With a nice little bench for breakfast ...

title: (01194) Okina - 8 Piruleta Kalea
description: Secluded area for about 4-5 Acs

title: (01170) Legutio - A-4402
description: Place romance. Spend the day next to the reservoir. Difficult access from the road, but gradually you can reach the meadow. Grass clippings and trees with shadows. BBQ area and tables. The location is perfect.

title: (01206) Vitoria-Gasteiz - 3 Garayo Auzoa
description: Free parking during the day, from 8am to 11pm. You cannot spend the night here as they close the barriers in summer (out of season they don't usually close). At the entrance to Garaio there is another parking lot to spend the night without problem.

title: (01206) Maturana -
description: Nice place to relax for a while after travelling. you can swim, few people.

title: (01206) Marieta -
description: Spot uniquement pour les petits vans car chaque place est séparée par un arbre.  Idéal pour passer la journée, baignade dans le lac et douche froide à l' extérieur, ombre pour un pique nique. Interdit de passer la nuit.

title: (01192) Burgelu - Unnamed Road
description: Nice, quiet free parking space for about 15 campers in front of a nature park. Approximately 5 km off the highway, no service. You feel safe.

title: (01206) -
description: Right next to the ornithological park of mendixur, large lake nearby. We spent a quiet night there. A few cars in the morning (walkers) but very quiet night. At the end of this path access to the lake but on foot. Wide path without mud.

title: (01428) Tuyo - Carr. de Irun
description: Picnic area, old area on the old road of Irún

title: (01240) Dulantzi - 27 Arriaga Bidea
description:
At the moment it is free, the app is not active.
Motorhome area with all services.
Great initiative of the Alegria-Dulantzi municipality.

title: (01138) Gopegi - 11 A-3608
description: Picnic area with two tables on the side of the road

title: (01192) Elburgo - Carretera Vieja de Salvatierra
description: By the roadside next to a gas station and a bar.

title: (01170) - 2B Kalea Zarraua
description: Nice place to spend the night, without camping. Next to the lake, very quiet. Barbecues, benches and tables and fountain with water. Don't drive Zarraua Kalea - many branches hang along the path at ca. 2.50m high. Take Barriti Kalea instead. There are toilets and sinks that work during the holiday season.

title: (01170) Legutio - 5 Madala Kalea
description: Parking on the street, very quiet urbanization, perfect to make a stop and rest for a few hours, even one night as we have spent. Easy parking and little movement in the area. Nearby the lake, since the other location marked by the app has signs prohibiting camping.

title: (01520) Landa - 1 Carboneros Bidea
description: Parking near the Ullibarri reservoir, a lot of people during the day, beach and bathing

title: (01170) Legutio - 6 Zabalain Kalea
description: Parking several places day and night. Quiet location overlooking the water on both sides of the road.

title: (01520) - 1 Bentabarri Kalea
description: Ample public parking with access to the Landa marsh picnic area. For AC and cars. Next to a restaurant. Playground, bathing area, taps and public toilets, picnic areas with plenty of shade. A marvel.

title: (01170) Legutio - 7 Calle de Gurutzalde
description: Parking spaces next to the lake, next to a quiet urbanization. greetings!

title: (09215) Treviño - 25 CL-127
description:
Level parking next to the grain silo, at the entrance of the village, next to the road. On the other side of the road there is another signposted car park.

The car parks closest to the town are very steep. It gave me a sense of security, there are employees who leave official cars here.

It is suitable for visiting the town.

title: (01138) Murua - 12 Urtegieta Kalea
description: Fountain to fill up with water. Flow ok . Trash cans nearby. There is also a small playground nearby.

title: (01170) Legutio - 9B Kalea San Roque
description: Parking 5 minutes from the town square. It has no toilet or water but it is very quiet and a festive place without problems. Bars and supermarket 3 minutes.

title: (01139) Vitoriano - 1 De Bitoriano a Santuario de Oro
title_short: (01139) Vitoriano - 1 De Bitoriano a Santuario de Oro
description: Beautiful place to spend the day and night. On the side of the road but no one passes during the night. Possibility of hiking and good climbing routes.

address.street: 1 De Bitoriano a Santuario de Oro

title: (01139) Álava - 1 Vitoriano Entitatea
description: Parking at the foot of the Santuario de Oro Parking spaces only suitable for "short" vans Quiet place with fields next to it and a starting point for excursions for the whole family. Also with climbing area Garbage and recycling bins in the corner of the parking lot

title: (01138) - 17A Parratxi Kalea
description: Quiet place to sleep on the outskirts of a small town before going up to the old quarry. Starting point for the gorbea. In the morning it fills up with cars. NO TABLES OR CHAIRS. without services.

title: (01193) Gauna - Vias Verdes del FC Vasco Narrvajo
title_short: (01193) Gauna - Vias Verdes del FC Vasco Narrvajo
description:
Quiet place to sleep next to the Vasco/Navarra greenway, accessible from the town of Gauna.
It has no services, you have the town of Gauna 1 km away and Gasteiz 15 km away.
Hiking routes to Itxogana or Indogana from the same car park.

address.street: Vias Verdes del FC Vasco Narrvajo

title: (09294) La Puebla de Arganzón - 7 Calle Estacion Geltokia Kalea
title_short: (09294) La Puebla de Arganzón - 7 Calle Estacion Geltokia Kalea
description: Place of repair on the road to Spain or Portugal. parking in the heart of the village (on the way to Saint Jacques) quiet despite the railway because little train. no service. Nice village on the banks of the Ebro.

title: (01128) Azáceta -
description: Nice stop off on the way through the mountains with lovely hiking routes accessible. Small gravel carpark, not easy to get flat but possible to get pretty close. Gorgeous woodland to explore just up the path.

title: (09294) La Puebla de Arganzón - A-4345
description: Quiet area to spend the night with the town very close

title: (09294) La Puebla de Arganzón - 19 Calle San Juan Donibane
title_short: (09294) La Puebla de Arganzón - 19 Calle San Juan Donibane
description: Small parking at the edge of a beautiful village. Right next to a small river. Water is clean and great for refreshing. Trash bins, benches and outdoor fitness park available. Spent some hours here, probably also good for over night.

title: (01139) - 4 Orobide Kalea
description: Next to the Bitoriano church, at the foot of the Nuestra Señora del Oro hermitage. Beautiful views of the valley, next to the road that goes up to the hermitage. About 10 places between trees slightly uneven. You can walk up to the sanctuary through the mountains (about 2 km) and take walks through the valley among cows, horses, sheep ...

title: (01206) Audikana - 19 Lubiarte Kalea
description: A quiet car park in a friendly village. I spent a quiet night here and felt safe. There is a pizza oven that you can use and a basketball court. The place is also easy to reach for larger mobile homes.

title: (01139) Bitoriano - 28 Herriko Kalea
description: Small water tap

title: (01170) Legutio -
description: A beautiful place in the forest, no possibility of turning around, you can park on the beach if the lake is not too high and if you are brave with a high enough vehicle, calm not too much passage on the ideal route for one night

title: (01130) Murgia - 64 San Martin Kalea
description: Parking near the Center. possibility to spend the night. Surroundings to visit, the sanctuary of the Golden Virgin. 3 kilometers from the parking lot in the park with tables, benches and barbecues.

title: (01130) Murgia - 64 San Martin Kalea
description:
Possibility of showering in the sports center.
There is also a gym and a swimming pool in case you feel like draining a bit, plus the town is very pretty.
very friendly in the sports center

title: (01130) Murgia - Palatu Kalea
description: Parking in a dead end street, in one of the sides of the sports center / swimming pool of the town. 500 meters from the town center, where there are shops and supermarkets, bars, pharmacy. It is ideal to leave the car because no one is upset.

title: (01170) Legutio -
description:
A space on the side of the road, with little traffic on a rainy day and by the lake
stop for lunch, the nights seem rather calm here!
in the middle of nature and flat
no prohibition sign

title: (01430) Zuhatzu Kuartango - 24 Zuhatzu Kuartango Entitatea
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools and also next to the health center. Cider house, they serve a cider house menu, very good service. Cider can be purchased. Parking the next one after the bridge with a lot of shade and tranquility... we have eaten a great menu at the pool bar, the charming girl, we have been able to eat with our pet. a marvel.

name: Camping el Roble Verde
title: (01428) Camping el Roble Verde
description: Camping El Roble Verde.

title: (01428) Nuvilla - Unnamed road
description: We have arrived to late for the camping opening hours and overnighted in a parking spot a few meters apart. Quiet place for sleeping, no services.

title: (01139) Sarria - 38 Elizalde Kalea
description: Parking in the cemetery of the village of Sarria, quiet. Village of Murgia nearby with bakery.

title: (01207) Jauregi - A-4139
description: Arabak lautada. BTT VASCO/NAVARRA (green route) Ullibarri station (Roncal)

title: (01138) Araba - Urtegieta Kalea
description: Beautiful tranquil spot visited only by a few locals and hikers. There is a grand parking just 100m down the road, but this spot has much better views. It is a large picknick area and starting point for hikes into the natural park. You may wake up to see ponies with cow bells grazing next to your camper. Trash containers and dixie toilets present, water from a natural stream nearby. Not recommended for low riding campers due to high speed bumps on the access road.

title: (01138) - Urtegieta Kalea
description: Asphalted parking with 2 well-kept portable toilets. The picnic area is before passing the river and the area for overnight after (easy river to pass). Perfect to spend the night and climb the mountain gorbea or cave. PS: the ascent from the village of murua is a paved road with socabones. Caution to cant with long vehicles.

title: (09294) Burgos - 1 Diseminado Pangua
description: Up the Hill, a small but comfort area With view points around four cardinals, a couple of label images tiping most notable places. It is the Hermitage of San Formerio

title: (01216) Markinez - 2 La Landa Plaza
description: Place to relax, a couple of tours of cashew trees, artificial caves, and hermitages, beautiful views from Belabia of the Sierra de Cantabria, you can see as far as Joar. possibility from arluzea to climb capalduy, to spend a pleasant weekend.

title: (01439) Sendadiano - 12 Sendadiano Entitatea
description: Picnic area with 4 tables, a fountain and swings. It's near the church, very quiet area. Difficult for vehicles over 5 m in length.

title: (01420) Pobes - 17 Pobes Entitatea
description: Public parking area behind a bar. Nothing special but close to the route national / highway. By walking to the near swimming pool you can have perfect meal.

title: (48145) Biscay - 38A Lugar Barrio Jon Deuna
description: Olalde hostel/hut. Picnic tables, bbq pit, and a river. There was also an RV that had been there for 2days. There is a number on the door you can call to stay inside as well. Great town with nice bars and entry to Gorbea national park.

title: (01139) Sarria - 4 Pista Forestal Kalea
description: Nice place to be during the week. On weekends it fills up and the car park is usually closed depending on capacity. Only 22 motorhomes are allowed to enter. Vans over 5 meters enter as a motorhome. The law says that you cannot remove awnings or tables and if the ertzaina passes, you can fine. Playground and picnic area. Different routes to do, both on foot and by bike. Pools 15 minutes walk to take a dip. Climbing area in Santuario de Oro with beautiful views, 20 minutes by car. The baths have schedules: From 8:15 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. in summer and in winter until 4:30 p.m. There are sinks to wash dishes. Town with services 3 kilometers away (Murgia). Site for the disabled, motorhomes, vans and 148 cars, you have to park well and outside the grassy area, they attract attention. The parking lot is well leveled. It is NOT allowed to make any type of fire, camping gas only inside your vehicle.

title: (48145) Ubidea - 47 Madalen Auzoa
description: Ubide: Quiet car park to spend the night or as a base for mountain biking and hiking routes. Nice little town to visit (Roman road, iron fountain). Several mountain routes leave from the town, including Mount Gorbea. It is located between Vitoria and Bilbao.

title: (48144) Ubide - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the middle of the Gorbeia park, very quiet and beautiful. It is worth going to visit and do some route.

title: (01139) Altube - 4 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea
title_short: (01139) Altube - 4 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea
description: Parking in the Altube service area. The store is open 24 hours. Quiet place to spend a night. The cafeteria closes at 11 pm and opens at 6 am

address.street: 4 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea

title: (01129) Virgala Menor - 2 Vitoria-Estella Errepidea
description: Parking next to a gas station.

title: (48144) Ubidea - Unnamed Road
description:
Perfect quiet nature spot next to a little stream.  Just before the border of the natural park.
Accessible via an unpaved road in good condition. (via Ubide).

title: (48145) Ubidea - 50 Madalen Auzoa
description: Just off the road, under the trees with a table and two concrete benches, a stream and greenery. Ideal for a lunch break, not tested at night. No services

title: (01139) Aldea - 5 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea
title_short: (01139) Aldea - 5 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea
description: Rest area with enough parking spaces. Toilets and shower are free and very clean. These are located in the restaurant behind the gas station. We spent one night there and felt very comfortable and safe.

address.street: 5 Area de Servicio Autopista A-68 Aldea

title: (01129) Apellaniz - 2 Elespara Auzoa
description:
Free parking at the entrance of Apellaniz. Gravel and with little unevenness, almost flat. Good place to park and stay overnight safely. No service. The Internet is good. Starting point for climbing areas and mountain paths. Please keep it clean ... Like we've never been there.

Backyard just néw, as seen in pics calm place to chill out a While.
Different fountains along town but square's doesnt work, BEST one the fisrt going Up.
In town hardly services, roaming truck to buy daylys but before turn to town there is a gas station where find the rest.

title: (48144) Ubide - 134C Lugar Barrio Altzusta
description: Quiet place next to a telecommunications tower. High area with beautiful views. The road is paved right up to the arrival at the site. There are trees that touch the height of the motorhome along the way.

title_short: (01169) Ibarra - De Leguitano a Mondragon Por Aramaio

address.street: De Leguitano a Mondragon Por Aramaio

title: (01169) Ibarra - Olaeta Entitatea
description: Quiet place next to a road with very little traffic. Terrain with some unevenness although there are some flat areas. The signal of coverage is bad.

description: Small free water fountain

description: Day and night parking, relax. Ideal for visiting the town or starting routes in the area. Perfect with dogs, nearby trails for your things. No services, just garbage.

title: (48210) -
description: Presazelai recreational area, picnic tables, grills, a stream that crosses. You can follow several hiking and mountain biking routes

title: (01440) Izarra - 2A Bidea Parrazar
description: Ostuño is the car park next to the park. In the park there is a soccer field and zibos and in summer the pool is open. From here you can make beautiful routes along the beautiful beech forest. The city is very close. Park parking Ostuño (with swings, tables, football field and swimming pools in summer). The village is nearby.

title: (01120) Arraya-Maestu - de Maestu a Apellaniz
description: Church and cemetery, no one problem to bother, place to Aline yourself.

title: (01129) Leorza - 4 Santa Lucia Kalea
description: Small parking at the entrance of the city. A pleasant environment Nature, cows and poultry are heard. Near orchards and recycling bins.

title: () - La Fuente Kalea
description: Peaceful sandy expanse at a quiet, unmanned gas station. Trash cans and picnic tables provided.

title: (01120) Arraia-Maeztu - 2 Tellazar Kalea
description: Parking located 100 meters from the road, but at night there is very little traffic without services, it is a safe place, with a restaurant bar and accommodation 30 meters away. Quiet place, although they usually park trucks that spend the night there, it is not a wonderful place, much better Run but if it catches you at a bad time or you do not want to deviate from the route it is perfect, it has a block of buildings next to it with several neighbors Very nice habituated to vans and motorhomes. The above is not a remarkable place but it assures you a night without major complications, neither the police, nor the town hall, nor the town puts problems.

title: (01129) Arraia-Maeztu - 29 San Agustin Kalea
description: Nice ,flat parking nearby and artificial pond. very beautiful. place for many vans. easy access

title: (48144) Ubide Vizcaya - Unnamed Road
description: Saldropo wetland. Gorbea Natural Park. Recreation area with fountain, chairs, tables and two WC modules. Starting point for many hiking and cycling routes.

title: (01211) Berantevilla - Berantevilla Entitatea
description: Recreation area with pool Rio (free), barbecues and tables. it also has swings to play with children and in the village there are two bars for a drink.

title: (01212) Urizaharra - 31 Urizaharra Hiribidea
description: Motorhome area for a total of 10, delimited. Emptying of gray and black water.

title: (01449) - 2 Parrangibel Bidea
description: Parking to go to the viewpoint of the gujuli waterfall (500m)

title: (20540) Eskoriatza - 3 Mendiola Elizatea Auzoa
description: Natural public car park (not an official car park) enjoyed by the few residents in Mendiola. It's a bit lopsided. It is a quiet place with beautiful views and a source of drinking water. Next to it there are signs indicating different routes that can be done, such as the route to the Urkulu reservoir or to the Kurtzebarri mountain. Nearby, a couple of minutes walk, there are rubbish bins (at the small roundabout with the stone religious statue). It's optional but I introduced myself to the neighbors and asked if they minded if I stayed there. There are so few houses there that talking to neighbors and introducing yourself is always a good option. It's a quiet and clean place so please let's keep it that way.

title: (01200) Agurain - 2A Zuazo Errepidea
description: Parking with no restrictions! I do not think is a problem for overnight! But I am not sure! Anyway great parking to visit the beautiful town!

description: Self-service laundry

title: (01200) Agurain - Bizkaia Kalea

description: Parking with fountain. Nice views.

title: (01439) Arriano - 10 Arriano Entitatea
description: It is a town where if you go to Salto de Nervión you can leave the car here and go the next day, it is very cute.

title: () Gesaltza Añana - 10 Mercado Kalea
description: Quiet and pleasant parking. Three camper places but you can park in the car places. Clean toilet block. Access preferably from the south west of the village as it is easier than by the small village streets.

title: (01213) Rivabellosa -
description: Parking for motorhomes in Eroski Miranda de Ebro (Álava) is a car park with many spaces that includes Iberdrola for electric companies, an Eroski gas station with very cheap prices and the Eroski Hypermarket with a bakery, fishmonger, butcher, bazaar or electronics, which if you have the card As a member they give you great discounts.

title: (48141) - 1 Arkaola Auzoa
description: Quiet place without services. It has tables and bbq. Next to an old airfield.

title: (01426) Gesaltza Añana - 12 Perruchico Kalea
description: It is an alternative stone terrain to the caravan / car parking that is in the same Añana. It has good views and is quiet, although in the morning it is busy with tourists.

title: () Lantaron - El Campo Kalea
description: Flat picnic area with fountain and a couple of tables. Perfect to visit the dolmen of La Lastra and the towns of the area on foot. Very quiet place and without any light pollution. Good access, wide and paved road to the place.

title: () Gesaltza Añana - 1 Real Kalea
description: Parking for the visit of Salinas de Anana saltworks, site under renovation worth visiting

title: (48144) Undurraga - 38 Undurraga Auzoa

description: Parking at the foot of the Sanctuary of the Virgin of Caicedo, 500m from the lake and an hour from the Añana salt mines.

title: (20567) Oñati - 56 Araotz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking of the Oñate caves. It is in the lower part of the mountain, in a very beautiful valley with many hiking trails. There is no toilet, no water.

title_short: (01129) Maeztu - de Maestu a San Roman de Campezo

address.street: de Maestu a San Roman de Campezo

title: (01118) Lagran - 55B Vitoria Hiribidea
description: Green area next to the river and next to the town

title: (01129) Korres - 5 Calle Afuera
description: Village located in the Izki Natural Park with small parking. One kilometer away there is a larger parking lot to sleep and better park there. The townspeople appreciate it. Interpretation Center right here.

title: (26339) Orzales -
description: Flat area to spend the night. You need a slightly all-terrain vehicle or at least on an elevated one to access the viewpoint. Spectacular view. Access to interesting track ahead.

title: (01118) Lagran - 52 Vitoria Hiribidea
description: New motorhome area in the town of Lagrán, signposted from the road. Gray and black water, drinking water. Tranquility, being a small mountain town. Nearby bar. This is what they say, but without checking: they give dinner in the var (under prior notice) and at 9:30 AM the baker passes by in the typical delivery van (the road aye crosses the town).

title: (01449) Unzá-Apreguíndana -

title: (01212) Zanbrana - 1 Kalea Eras

title: (01208) Galarreta - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area for exits on foot and btt routes through the Sierra de Urkilla (south-west part of the Aratz-Aitzkorri Natural Park. Several marked trails. There is a nearby winding. Very quiet and very cool views. It is accessed from the village of Galarreta for a track in very good condition.

title: (01118) Lagran - 1 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Quiet area with beautiful views. With the possibility of hiking trails.

title: (20500) Arrasate - 10D San Andres Auzoa Auzoa
description: Vehicle washing facilities. A pressure washing station (shampoo, tires, brush, wax ...) for large vehicles.

title: (01423) Villambrosa -

title: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
title_short: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
description: Viewpoint overlooking the whole of western La Rioja. Plenty of parking and turning space. Great lunch spot.

title: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
title_short: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
description: Very quiet roadside space

title: (01128) Quintana - 1 Las Huertas Bidea
description: Parking near the entrance of the Izki natural park, no services, in the Quintana village little thing but in the forest several marked excursions.

title: (20567) Oñati - 5 Arantzazu Auzoa
description: Quiet parking near the sanctuary in which the Basilica is located with its impressive facade tower and torre. Possibility of spending a quiet night there without any problem.

title: (48211) Abadiño - 2 BI-623

title: (20567) Oñati - 41 Arantzazu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Room for 1 or 2 vans with a nice view and a few meters walk from the cheese factory / shepherds school, small picnic area and fountain.

title: (20567) Oñati - 2 Arantzazu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Asphalted parking for vehicles, access to motorhomes is good, the parking spaces are narrow and long enough, we with a 6m without problem, next to the sanctuary of Aranzazu, fairly flat. We spent the night in 4 motorhomes and 4 campers, a bit of wind during the night but we had a good night. Several routes starting from the parking lot.
